survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of professional networking events to improve future events, enhance attendee experience, and measure the effectiveness of networking opportunities.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?

questions.question_text: Which of the following activities did you participate in during the event? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are clearly displayed on mobile devices.

script.question_text: Which of the following activities did you participate in during the event? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How effective was the event in helping you make valuable professional connections?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How effective was the event in helping you make valuable professional connections?

questions.question_text: What was your primary reason for attending this networking event?
answer_options: To meet potential clients or customers
To find job or career opportunities
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What was your primary reason for attending this networking event?
answer_options: To meet potential clients or customers
To find job or career opportunities

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific connections or opportunities you gained from this event.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific connections or opportunities you gained from this event.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the diversity of industries represented at the event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the diversity of industries represented at the event?

questions.question_text: Did the event provide adequate opportunities for one-on-one networking?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear, balanced scale for responses. Ensure the question is concise.

script.question_text: Did the event provide adequate opportunities for one-on-one networking?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend a similar networking event in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This question is key for measuring future engagement.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend a similar networking event in the future?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future networking events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture actionable feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future networking events?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the speakers or panelists at the event?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who attended keynote speeches or panel discussions (Q2).
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure the question is only shown to relevant respondents.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Add routing logic based on Q2 responses.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the speakers or panelists at the event?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who attended keynote speeches or panel discussions (Q2).

questions.question_text: How well did the event meet your expectations?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear, balanced scale for responses. Ensure the question is concise.

script.question_text: How well did the event meet your expectations?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this event to a colleague or professional contact?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This is a key metric for event success.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this event to a colleague or professional contact?
